from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

# Get data out of the service bus with additional fields needed for Horizon data
service_bus_data = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT
                        AppealsDocumentMetadataID
                        ,documentId
                        ,caseId
                        ,caseReference
                        ,version
                        ,filename
                        ,originalFilename
                        ,size
                        ,mime
                        ,documentURI
                        ,publishedDocumentURI
                        ,virusCheckStatus
                        ,fileMD5
                        ,dateCreated
                        ,dateReceived
                        ,datePublished
                        ,lastModified
                        ,caseType
                        ,redactedStatus
                        ,documentType
                        ,sourceSystem
                        ,origin
                        ,owner
                        ,author
                        ,description
                        ,caseStage
                        ,horizonFolderId

                        -- Start Horizon columns
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS caseNumber
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS caseworkTypeGroup
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS caseworkTypeAbbreviation
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS versionFilename
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS incomingOutgoingExternal
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS publishedStatus
                        -- End Horizon columns
                        
                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,SourceSystemID
                        ,IngestionDate 
                        ,NULLIF(ValidTo, '') AS ValidTo
                        ,'' as RowID
                        ,IsActive
                        
                    FROM 
                        {service_bus_table}

# Get data out of Horizon and matching the SB schema (with additional fields and ensure data types match)
horizon_data = spark.sql(f"""
                SELECT DISTINCT 
                    CAST(NULL AS LONG) AS AppealsDocumentMetadataID
                    ,Doc.documentId
                    ,Doc.casenodeid AS caseId
                    ,Doc.caseReference
                    ,Doc.version
                    ,Doc.filename as filename
                    ,Doc.filename as originalFilename
                    ,Doc.size
                    --,Aie.mime
                    --,Aie.documentURI
                    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS publishedDocumentURI
                    ,Doc.virusCheckStatus
                    --,Aie.fileMD5
                    ,Doc.dateCreated
                    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS dateReceived
                    ,Doc.datePublished
                    ,Doc.lastModified
                    ,Doc.caseworkType as caseType
                    ,Doc.redactedStatus
                    ,Doc.documentType
                    ,Doc.sourceSystem -- set to horizon
                    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS origin
                    --,Aie.owner
                    --,Aie.author
                    ,Doc.documentDescription AS description
                    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS caseStage
                    ,Doc.folderid AS horizonFolderId
                    
                    -- Start Horizon Fields Not in SB
                    ,Doc.caseNumber
                    ,Doc.caseworkTypeGroup
                    ,Doc.caseworkTypeAbbreviation
                    ,Doc.versionFilename
                    ,Doc.incomingOutgoingExternal
                    ,Doc.publishedStatus
                    -- END Horizon Fields Not in SB

                    ,"0" as Migrated
                    ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
                    ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
                    , to_timestamp(Doc.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
                    ,CAST(null as string) as ValidTo -- to avoid any null descrepancies
                    ,'' as RowID
                    ,'Y' as IsActive
                FROM
                    {horizon_table} AS Doc
                LEFT JOIN {aie_extracts_table} AS Aie ON Doc.DocumentId = Aie.DocumentId
                WHERE
                    Doc.ingested_datetime = (SELECT MAX(ingested_datetime) FROM {horizon_table})
                    AND Aie.ingested_datetime = (SELECT MAX(ingested_datetime) FROM {aie_extracts_table})
Now need to sort internal ids, IsActive flags, and valid_to dates

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_nsip_s51_advice_calculations_base
AS
SELECT  
    row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY adviceid ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
    ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate asc, adviceid asc) AS NSIPAdviceID
    ,adviceid
    ,IngestionDate
    ,ValidTo
    ,'0' AS Migrated
    ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY adviceid ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
        WHEN 1 THEN
            'Y'
        ELSE
            'N'
    END AS IsActive                
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_s51_advice

df_calcs = spark.sql("""
                        SELECT
                            CurrentRow.NSIPAdviceID
                            ,CurrentRow.adviceid 
                            ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                            ,COALESCE(NULLIF(CurrentRow.ValidTo,''), NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                            ,CASE
                                WHEN raw.adviceid IS NOT NULL THEN 
                                    "1"
                                ELSE 
                                    "0"
                            END AS Migrated
                            ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                        FROM
                            vw_nsip_s51_advice_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_nsip_s51_advice_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                ON CurrentRow.adviceid = NextRow.adviceid
                                AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT adviceid FROM  odw_harmonised_db.sb_s51_advice) AS Raw
                                ON CurrentRow.adviceid = Raw.adviceid 
                            ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed

results = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT NSIPAdviceID
                        ,adviceId
                        ,adviceReference
                        ,caseId
                        ,caseReference
                        ,title
                        ,titleWelsh
                        ,from
                        ,agent
                        ,method
                        ,enquiryDate
                        ,enquiryDetails
                        ,enquiryDetailsWelsh
                        ,adviceGivenBy 
                        ,adviceDate
                        ,adviceDetails
                        ,adviceDetailsWelsh
                        ,status
                        ,redactionStatus
                        ,attachmentIds

                        --Start Horizon only fields
                        ,Section51Advice
                        ,EnquirerFirstName
                        ,EnquirerLastName
                        ,AdviceLastModified
                        ,AttachmentCount
                        ,AttachmentsLastModified
                        ,LastPublishedDate
                        ,WelshLanguage
                        ,CaseWorkType
                        --End Horizon only fields

                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,IngestionDate
                        ,ValidTo
                        ,MD5(CONCAT(
                                    IFNULL(CAST(NSIPAdviceID AS bigint), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceId AS integer), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceReference AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(caseId AS integer), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(caseReference AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(title AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(titleWelsh AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(from AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(agent AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(method AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(enquiryDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(enquiryDetails AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(enquiryDetailsWelsh AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceGivenBy AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDetails AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(adviceDetailsWelsh AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(status AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(redactionStatus AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(attachmentIds AS String), '.')

                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Section51Advice AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquirerFirstName AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(EnquirerLastName AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(AdviceLastModified AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(AttachmentCount AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(AttachmentsLastModified AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(LastPublishedDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(WelshLanguage AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(CaseWorkType AS String), '.')

                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(Migrated AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(ODTSourceSystem AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(IngestionDate AS String), '.')
                                    ,IFNULL(CAST(ValidTo AS String), '.')
                            )
                        ) AS RowID
                        ,IsActive
    FROM 
        {spark_table_final}""")
select count(*) from odw_harmonised_db.nsip_s51_advice where isactive='Y'
